hero3_title: From Local Fishermen to Your Plate
hero3_text: We select fresh seafood from local fishermen and vegetables from Chiang Rai farmers‚Äîdelicious, safe, and accessible.
exp_p1: We want every meal to be more than food‚Äîtime to relax, talk, and share moments with loved ones in Chiang Rai‚Äôs charm.
exp_p2: Choose cool indoor comfort or an outdoor breeze with soft music and warm lights‚Äîevery table feels special.

sig_desc: Signature plates that reflect our identity‚ÄîNorthern classics and local seafood favorites.
sig_note: * You can change dish names, prices, and images.
dish1_desc: Authentic Northern Thai khao soi with a rich, fragrant coconut curry broth. Served with tender braised chicken drumstick and golden egg noodles, alongside pickled mustard greens and shallots‚Äîtrue Lanna style.
dish2_desc: Carefully selected duck tongues marinated with aromatic spices until the flavor soaks in, then fried at the right temperature for a dry, extra-crispy bite without excess oil‚Äîperfect as a snack.
dish3_desc: A bold, signature papaya salad with pork sausage, fresh fermented pork, and crispy pork cracklings. Seasoned with fermented fish sauce for deeper aroma, richer color, and a distinctive taste unlike typical som tam.
dish4_desc: Chiang Rai-style rice noodles in a savory tomato-and-pork broth, featuring dried kapok flowers and a perfectly balanced sweet-sour-salty taste.
dish5_desc: Premium pork neck with fine marbling, marinated in our house sauce and charcoal-grilled until juicy and aromatic. Served with spicy Isan-style dipping sauce.
origin_p: We carefully select ingredients‚Äîfresh seafood and pesticide-free vegetables. Every dish is safe and delicious.
contact_p1: Fresh seafood / rich khao soi / Thai & local dishes‚Äîcome taste the ‚ÄòMueang Nuea‚Äô experience!
contact_p2: For a date night, family meal, or small gathering‚Äîreach us by phone, Line, or visit the restaurant.
